attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877239489. The Ford Figo is one of life’s easier choices. Packed with new looks, and remarkable technologies, this compact car looks and feels much larger than it appears. The Figo’s cabin is effortless with a wide opening door and enough room and seating position. Even in tight parking spots you can get in and out easily thanks to the slim doors. The interior is well spaced out and has ample space at the back for the passengers.

Offer includes free gift of your choice from one of the following options:
- Smash & Grab tint
- Auto Armor ( 2 in 1)
- R1000 fuel voucher

•	We deliver countrywide
•	Trade-ins Welcome
•	Finance Arranged

attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0872502162. WARRANTY VALID UNTIL 2023 OR 100 000 KM'S. 
THIS DATSUN GO 1.2 MID IS ONE OF THE MOST PRACTICAL, FUEL EFFICIENT AND CONVENIENT VEHICLES THAT YOU CAN FIND. IT IS EASY TO GET AROUND THE CITY AND GET INTO TIGHT PARKING SPACES. ITS 1.2 LITRE ENGINE PRODUCES 50 KW OF POWER AND 104 NM OF TORQUE. IT HAS A TOP SPEED OF 161 KM/PH. IT HAS MANUFACTURERS' CLAIMED FUEL CONSUMPTION FIGURES OF 5.5 LITRES PER 100 KM. 

ALL PRE-OWNED VEHICLES UNDERGO A STRINGENT AA MULTI-POINT CHECK AND AA ROADWORTHY BEFORE DELIVERY. WE DELIVER COUNTRYWIDE AND IT GETS EVEN BETTER, WE COME TO YOU. FINANCE AVAILABLE AND A TEST DRIVE IS A MUST. PRICE EXCLUDES LICENSE REGISTRATION, ADMINISTRATION, DELIVERY, AND ON THE ROAD FEES. *ERRORS AND OMISSIONS EXCEPTED

attributes.description:
5 YEAR/ 100 000KM WARRANTY ; 3 YEAR/ 60 000KM SERVICE PLAN
The Peugeot 208 has had a makeover: this compact, next-generation hatchback is now even sportier and more elegant. Already benefiting from an advanced and innovative design, the 208 becomes sharper and more distinctive with a new front bumper and a wider fully integrated grille. This striking new look is supported by new two-tone headlamps fitted as standard from Active trim level. Combined with restyled front fog lamps, this fresh face subtly transforms the 208.
